name: Secret of Mars
description:
This is a 3D tower-defense game made for our team project and for fun. It's not hard to play and won't take you too much time. If you enjoy crushing the enemy and have some time to kill then this is perfect for you. It can be run on both PC and Mac.

The story happened on one of the Egyptian colony - Mars. You're a Guardian of the sacred relic that wanted by lots of planets. Awaken by intruders you need to resurrect your warriors to eliminate enemies and regain full power to summon the Pharaoh...

Enjoy and please feel free to give comment or advice, we will try to keep improving the game. 

"W" "S" "A" "D" & "Mouse Right click" "Mouse Scroll" to control camera view, "Mouse Left click" to select & build, support touch screen.

PS: Mac version has  extra button.

Created by: Yongli (Eric) Wang, Ryan Valdes, Wendi Tanaka
